directions: In a bowl, mix the peaches, onion, garlic, ginger, chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, cilantro, and lime. Season with salt and pepper. Chill until serving.
ingredients: 1 cup sliced canned peaches, drained and chopped
1 ½ teaspoons minced fresh ginger root
2 teaspoons minced chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
title: Chipotle Peach Salsa with Cilantro
